{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=WS831 |revision=(Honor Cube) |asin=B00UR7WMWA |est_release_date=04/08/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=QIS-WS831 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5.1 |pwr_amp=2.1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=HiSilicon |cpu1_model=SD5650H |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GG6KB-15 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812AE |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |flags=NFC |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.3.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=E0:19:1D,8C:34:FD |oui_eth=E0:19:1D,8C:34:FD }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Mini Router}} :[http://www.chineselectronic.com/latest-chinese-electronic-news/huawei-honor-router-is-officially-released/ Press release]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.homemediatech.net/huawei-honor-ws831-unbiased-review/1356 ''Huawei WS831'' on '''HomeMediaTech'''] *[http://www.gearbest.com/networking-communication/pp_174773.html ''Huawei WS831'' on '''GearBest'''] <small> :● The mainstream of Dual Band 2.4GHz / 5GHz AC Intelligent Routers :Built-in Dual Band balun antenna 2.4GHz 2x2 MIMO, 5GHz 2x2 MIMO :Wireless protocol 802.11 n/ac 2.4GHz (300Mbps), 5GHz (867Mbps) :Interface: 1x USB 2.0, 1x WAN FE (100Mbps), 2x LAN FE (100Mbps) </small> *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/huawei-ws831.shtml ''Huawei WS831'' on '''iXBT'''] :SoC: [[HiSilicon]] SD5650H @1GHz :RAM: 128MB, Flash: 16MB :[[Realtek]] RTL8192ER 2T2R 802.11bgn (2.4GHz) :[[Realtek]] RTL8812AE 2T2R 802.11an/ac (5GHz) :OUI: 8C:34:FD :FW: V100R001C01B018 *[http://mysku.ru/blog/china-stores/32164.html ''Huawei WS831 Honor'' on '''MySku'''] (RU) :"AM1WS831HRM VER" is silkscreened on the board in the photos :IPEX MHF4 RF coaxial connector (the smallest mini RF connector) *[http://www.aliexpress.com/store/product/100-Original-Huawei-WS831-Honor-Wireless-Home-White-Router-Support-2-4G-5G-WiFi-1GHz-CPU/600815_32332038890.html ''Huawei WS831 Honor'' on '''AliExpress'''] :CPU: Hi5650H @1GHz dual-core ARM :RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 16MB (SPI) :OUI: E0:19:1D (Huawei Corp.) *[http://www.smart4gwifi.com/huawei-ws831-honor-router.html ''Huawei WS831 Honor'' on '''Smart4GWiFi'''] *[http://blog.ich8.com/post/5237 ''Huawei Honor'' on '''blog.ich8.com'''] :CPU: [[HiSilicon]] SD5650 @1GHz; Flash: 16MB (SPI) :RAM: ''Winbond'' W631GG6KB-15 128MB (DDR3 @1333MHz 9-9-9) :2.4GHz RF: [[Realtek]] RTL8192ER (802.11bgn 2×2:2 PCIe) :5GHz RF: [[Realtek]] RTL8812AE (802.11abgn+ac 2×2:2 PCIe) :Eth: 1x FE WAN, 2x FE LAN; USB: 1x USB2.0
===See also=== *[[Huawei WS860s (Honor Cube)]] *[http://www.amazon.com/Huawei-wireless-Android-2-5inch-Storage/dp/B00UR7WMWA/ ''Huawei Honor Cube WS860s Wireless Router'' on '''Amazon'''] :CPU @1.5GHz (Android 4.2 / Linux) :HDD 2.5" 1TB SATA 3.0 Storage (version TV Box) *[http://www.au.kddi.com/english/mobile/product/wlan/home_spot_cube_2/spec/ ''KDDI Home Spot Cube2 Router'']
